subject: CNN Alerts: bush

CNN Alerts: bush






 



Alert Name: bush
Book: Senators who OK'd war didn't read key report

05/28/07 09:26 PM, EDT
A new biography of Sen. Hillary Rodham Clinton says she and most other senators did not read a key intelligence report before the 2002 vote to authorize war in Iraq.
FULL STORY
